data.actual_result: Typing cursor appears before the magnifying glass moves over fully
data.expected_result: Typing cursor appears when the magnifying glass moves overy fully
data.short_description: Typing cursor appears early when searching in members under server settings
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server you can manage members - Open server settings, and go to members - Tap on the search feature at the top - Observe the typing cursor as search opens
